package.name: HTTP
package.description: The HTTP class is a class with static methods for doing miscellaneous HTTP related stuff like date formatting, language negotiation or HTTP redirection.

release.notes: * stripping CR/LF characters from $url in HTTP::absoluteURI() * fixed bug #2851 (@'s trigger errorhandlers/debugger) * fixed bug #3378 (default proto is always https in absoluteURI() on IIS)
